text: Änglar och en massa kärlek is a studio album by Arvingarna, released on the Sony Music label on 18 December 2013, consisting of a 2013 Beach party of the 2012 single "Semester". In 2014, the album was awarded a Guldklaven Award in the "Best album of the year" category."Dagens nyheter 14 July 2014 - Lasse Stefanz-sångare fick fjärde Guldklaven" ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#ebf5ff" !# !Title !Writer !Length |- bgcolor="#ebf5ff" |- | 1. || "Ta mig tillbaka nu" ||F.
